query.default: select * from Sungero_Reports_SecurityReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId order by RequestId

query.mssql: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] varchar(256) NOT NULL, [RequestId] int NULL, [CounterpartyName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [CounterpartyReqs] nvarchar(max) NULL, [MainDocumentName] nvarchar(max) NULL, [CheckingDate] nvarchar(max) NULL, [CheckingResult] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Comment] nvarchar(max) NULL, [Note] nvarchar(max) NULL)
query.postgres: create table {0} ([ReportSessionId] citext NOT NULL, [RequestId] int NULL, [CounterpartyName] citext NULL, [CounterpartyReqs] citext NULL, [MainDocumentName] citext NULL, [CheckingDate] citext NULL, [CheckingResult] citext NULL, [Comment] citext NULL, [Note] citext NULL)
